actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to submit to Congress reports in electronic form.
short_title: Department of Veterans Affairs Electronic Reporting Act of 2008

summary.text: Department of Veterans Affairs Electronic Reporting Act of 2008 - Requires that, whenever the Secretary of Veterans Affairs or any other official of the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) is required to submit to Congress (or any committee thereof) a report, such Secretary or official shall submit a copy in an electronic format.

titles.title: Department of Veterans Affairs Electronic Reporting Act of 2008
To amend title 38, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to submit to Congress reports in electronic form.
